data.name: Ravager Boomer
data.description: A heavily armed space pirate who supports his allies with plasma cannon fire.

starItems.name: Ravager Boomer
starItems.description: A heavily armed space pirate who supports his allies with plasma cannon fire.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for the primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for primary and secondary targets + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for self.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

2.description:
<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

3.description:
<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies. <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Assist non-<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies. <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Assist non-<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Assist non-<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, always assist non-<color=#fff568>MINION RAVAGER</color> allies

5.description:
<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to Assist <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies. <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Assist non-<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies. On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, always assist non-<color=#fff568>MINION RAVAGER</color> allies.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.
